Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Lawrence Cadiz (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off Carey Secrest (COL)...
Injured on 5/25/2015 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,078,571 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,078,571 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Atlanta on 4/23/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2018, hitting .583 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2018, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2018, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,421,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Montreal to Chicago on 3/2/2019 (Going to CHI: 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: 1B Ralph Keiper, C Alberto Perez, P Robert Brinn, CF Robert Straight, P Terry Katz)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/16/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $10,250,000 per year...
